name: DAT SHOOTER [IN DEVELOPMENT]
description:
DAT SHOOTER - university project

Welcome to my first FPS game. This game was developed by an aspiring developer as a university project. 

I hope you enjoy the game. I ask for your feedback. I'm sorry, the game is in its raw state and will be further supplemented, I beg you to rate the game as it is. If you find bugs, tell your attitude to this game, add ideas, it will all be fine, regardless of what you say

Сontrols:

WASD - Movement

1 - Equip pistol

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Dash and Wall Running

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Aim
